Method Detail

eraseWords

public void eraseWords(ArrayList<WordCount> words)
Erase all the words on the canvas.

setMultiColor

public void setMultiColor(boolean mc)
Set the display to be black or multi-coloured.

Parameters:
mc - when the value of mc is true, each word will be drawn in a different colour chosen from the set of available colours. When the value of mc is false, each word should be drawn in black.

setStrategy

public void setStrategy(String strategy)
Set the strategy to use to display the words.

showPercentage

public void showPercentage(ArrayList<WordCount> words,
                           int pc)
Display a percentage of the given list of words.

Parameters:
words - the list of words to display
pc - the percentage required in the display. The percentage should be a number between 1 and 100 inclusive.
